item.title: New Blog
item.description:
Hello! I’m Daniel and this is my new blog.

Ok, maybe not so new. I had a blog on Tumblr about my gamedev adventures but it was not updated frequently. I decided to move it to github pages and start fresh using more lightweight Hugo static generator.

I’m going to write posts in English and in Polish. First tag will always be languae. I’m going to copy posts from my Tumblr blog here, but that’s not a priority.

I’m going to write about programming, my gamedev stuff, my projects, nice tools I use but also about art and other things.

Why Hugo

Hugo is static website generator written by spf13 in Go. It’s singe binary exectutable, pretty fast and easy to use. There is lot of free themes avaliable. As person without expirience in webdev I was able to pick and modifie the theme without a hassle.

item.title: Daniel Lewan - TeddyDD
item.description: Hi. The name’s Daniel and I study at Nicolas Copernicus University in Toruń, Poland. I’m interested in programming, gamedev, art and astronomy.
